tweet: Every day, financial insecurity forces people to leave their jobs because they can’t afford child care, transportation, or an unexpected emergency. My #AmericanFamilyAct would bring much-needed stability to their lives by helping them cover these essentials and continue to work. https://twitter.com/TIME/status/1090950352998973441 …

For decades, we’ve seen economic growth almost entirely benefit the top 10% of Americans. My #AmericanFamilyAct would address this inequality, providing critical support to low-income & middle-class parents who have been left out—ultimately cutting child poverty nearly in half.

Everywhere I go, I meet people who are working hard & can’t afford some combination of housing, health care, higher education & child care.

These aren’t nice-to-haves—they are must haves.

My #AmericanFamilyAct w/ @SenSherrodBrown would help change that. http://time.com/5501177/child-tax-credit-michael-bennet/ …
